content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":23407,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8171f480-f64f-40f4-a713-6f9735bec260/QE_onboarding_19.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8171f480-f64f-40f4-a713-6f9735bec260/QE_onboarding_19.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"QE_onboarding_19.png\",\"name\":\"QE_onboarding_19.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"8171f480-f64f-40f4-a713-6f9735bec260\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":512,\"height\":150},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The very first major customer of EPAM was SAP product company. It has developed a corporate solution that includes more than three hundred software products. The most popular ones are SAP ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning), SAP CRM (Customer Relationship Management), SAP SCM (Supply Chain Management), SAP Commerce, SAP HCM (Human Capital Management). \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Most SAP users are large companies with impressive turnover, which hold leading positions in the market by searching for new business opportunities and switching to digital. The losses that a business can incur in case of incorrect operation of SAP digital platform are significant. Timely testing of SAP modules allows you to quickly identify defects, which means avoiding financial and reputational losses.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SAP testing is required in the following cases: \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When the system is just being implemented (roll-out) and it is necessary to reduce possible risks;   \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When migrating the system (for example, to cloud or to a new version); \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When developing customization of SAP modules; \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Integrating with other systems. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SAP testing is carried out both manually and automatically. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Specifics: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.       Specialized set of tools: \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To select appropriate SAP testing tools, one need to understand SAP technologies. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Currently there are 2 versions of the SAP ERP interface: SAP GUI, SAP UI5. The first one was created using specific technologies in the ABAP language and is a desktop solution. Therefore, test automation can only be carried out by specialized tools (eCATT, CBTA, Tricentis Tosca, Worksoft Certify, LeanFT).  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The second is a web application, and standard frameworks can be used to automate its testing. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In addition, SAP has developed its own test management system, which tracks the results of both manual and automated testing (SAP Solution Manager). \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.       Integrated SAP architecture: \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SAP is used for automation and management of such internal processes of the enterprise as accounting, trade, production, finance, personnel management, warehouse management, management analysis, etc. Each internal process is represented as a separate module and is called by separate transactions (commands). \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To become a SAP tester, one needs to understand the principles of numerous modules operation, the logic of component interaction. It helps a lot if a person has an economic background (experience or education). SAP consultants from EntAps EPAM practice often come to help and guide. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.       Focus on integration testing: \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Another feature of SAP testing is the complex landscape of the customer's systems. As a rule, if a company has SAP, then there are also other systems. Therefore, most often testers have to check all external systems in terms of their integration with SAP. These can be cash desks, shops, post terminals, tablets, phones, various web applications, etc. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why is it cool to be a SAP tester?  \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Test engineers who were able to understand SAP platforms are able to work with any other systems, because they develop complex analytical thinking. In addition, our customers using SAP products are always high-profile brands (Google, Coca-Cola, Adidas, Whirlpool, Burberry, Sephora, Tory-Burch, Chevron, etc.).  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SAP testers have the opportunity to find out what is \\\"under the hood\\\" of well-known companies. For example, a simple purchase of an iPhone on the website apple.com  is the first step in the chain of the SAP systems operation scenario:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":83839,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b8130d1f-1e70-4902-96b4-4fa22f4212a7/Picture5.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b8130d1f-1e70-4902-96b4-4fa22f4212a7/Picture5.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture5.png\",\"name\":\"Picture5.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b8130d1f-1e70-4902-96b4-4fa22f4212a7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":598,\"height\":296},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In addition, SAP itself is our customer, and EPAM is its platinum partner.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SAP company does not stand still, constantly develops and uses various innovations: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IoT, Machine Learning, Blockchain, voice and chat bots, iRPA.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" This in turn allows SAP testers to follow the latest trends. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn more\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" about SAP using online courses \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://open.sap.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"openSAP\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learninghub.sap.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SAP Learning Hub.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For questions about SAP Testing, you can contact Bartash\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and Rezvina\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"9.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\"}}}]}]}]}}"
